title: Show HN: I recreated Windows XP as my portfolio
author: mitchivin
aiHeadline: In a world where we already have Windows 11, someone decided to recreate Windows XP as their portfolio project because apparently, 2025 wasn't weird enough.

title: The MacBook has a sensor that knows the exact angle of the screen hinge
author: leephillips
aiHeadline: Apple just spent who knows how much money to create a sensor that tells you the exact angle of your MacBook screen, proving once again that they know what you need better than you do.

title: Serverless Horrors
author: operator-name
aiHeadline: Serverless computing: the future of cloud computing where you don't have to manage servers, unless you're one of the unlucky ones who has to manage the serverless horrors.

title: Show HN: I'm a dermatologist and I vibe coded a skin cancer learning app
author: sungam
aiHeadline: A dermatologist has coded a skin cancer learning app, proving that even doctors need a break from saving lives and want to flex their coding skills.

title: Navy SEALs reportedly killed North Korean fishermen to hide a failed mission
author: nomilk
aiHeadline: Navy SEALs reportedly killed North Korean fishermen to cover up a failed mission, because nothing says 'mission success' like a good old-fashioned cover-up.
